title: The 10 Best Ryder Cups of All Time
headline: The 10 Best Ryder Cups of All Time
description: Wild finishes are a staple of recent Ryder Cup matches, but some stand out more than others. Heroic or heartbreaking, here are the ten best events in Ryder Cup history.
